lines.gurmukhi: AwiD kY ibAwiD kY aupwiD kY qiRdoK huqy gurisK swD gur bYd pY lY Awey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aadhi Kai Biaadhi Kai Oupaadhi Kai Tridokh Houtay , Gursikh Saadh Gur Baid Pai Lai Aaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The disciple servant of the Guru brings all those who suffer from physical, psychic or ailments of mind, to the doctor like True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: AMimq ktwC pyK jnm mrn myty jon jm BY invwry ABY pd pwey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Anmit Kataachh Paykh Janam Maran Maytay , Jon Jam Bhai Nivaaray Abhai Pad Paaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The True Guru obliterates their cycle of re-incarnation by casting one clement look of grace upon them. He makes them free of all psychosis of death and thus they attain a state of fearlessness.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml mkrMd rj lypn kY dIiKAw sIiKAw sMjm kY AauKd Kvwey hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Makarand Raj Laypan Kai , Deekhiaa Seekhiaa Sanjam Kai Aoukhad Khavaaay Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By providing support to all those who come to his refuge, by consecrating them with practice of meditation and imparting them with divine knowledge, he provides them with the medication of Naam and restraint.

lines.gurmukhi: krm Brm Koey Dwvq brij rwKy inhcl miq suK shj smwey hY ]78]
lines.transliteration_english: Karam Bharam Khoay Dhaavat Baraji Raakhay , Nihachal Mati Soukh Sahaj Samaaay Hai ?78?

Shabad OS B.translation: And thus the ailing persons sheds away the network of rites and rituals controlling the wandering mind for enjoyment of false pleasures. They then stay in stable disposition and acquire state of equipoise. (78)
